ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_lgamp1 | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( log_G ` ( A + 1 ) ) = ( ( log_G ` A ) + ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( log_G ` ( A + 1 ) ) ) = ( exp ` ( ( log_G ` A ) + ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_lgamcl | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( log_G ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_dmgmn0 | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_logcld | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_efadd | |- ( ( ( log_G ` A ) e. CC /\ ( log ` A ) e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( ( log_G ` A ) + ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) x. ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 7, 8 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( ( log_G ` A ) + ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) x. ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eflog | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 ) -> ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) = A ) |
| 11 | 4, 6, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) = A ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) x. ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) x. A ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 9, 12 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( log_G ` ( A + 1 ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) x. A ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_1nn0 | |- 1 e. NN0 |
| 15 | 14 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> 1 e. NN0 ) |
| 16 | 5, 15 | #P_dmgmaddnn0 | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( A + 1 ) e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eflgam | |- ( ( A + 1 ) e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( log_G ` ( A + 1 ) ) ) = ( _G ` ( A + 1 ) ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( log_G ` ( A + 1 ) ) ) = ( _G ` ( A + 1 ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eflgam | |- ( A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) -> ( exp ` ( log_G ` A ) ) = ( _G ` A ) ) |
